paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on BRCA2 variants, including penetrance data and individual records of carriers.

patients.demographics: Unspecified, but all are from Puerto Rico

individual_records.phenotype_details: Breast cancer, no family history of cancer reported.
individual_records.evidence_sentence: The patient UPR1024, BRCA2 c.1794_1798del5 carrier, was diagnosed at 52 years of age and did not report any family history of cancer.

individual_records.phenotype_details: Breast cancer, with family history of prostate cancer.
individual_records.evidence_sentence: PRI739, a BRCA2 E1308X carrier, was diagnosed at 53 and two first-degree relatives with a history of prostate cancer.

functional_data.summary: The E1308X mutation is a recurrent founder mutation in the Puerto Rican population.

variants.segregation_data: The E1308X mutation was found in eight unrelated individuals, indicating a founder effect.
variants.evidence_level: High, due to recurrence in multiple unrelated cases.
variants.additional_notes: The E1308X mutation accounts for 89% of the identified BRCA2 carriers in this study.
key_quotes: Interestingly, BRCA2 mutations represented 100% of the mutation carriers.
The totality of the patients identified carried a pathogenic variant in BRCA2, with the BRCA2 E1308X truncating variant accounting for 89% of carriers.

individual_records.phenotype_details: Breast cancer, no family history of cancer reported.
individual_records.evidence_sentence: The patient UPR1024, BRCA2 c.1794_1798del5 carrier, was diagnosed at 52 years of age and did not report any family history of cancer.

functional_data.summary: The c.1794_1798delATTTT variant results in a frameshift and premature stop codon.

variants.segregation_data: The variant was found in one individual in this study.
variants.evidence_level: High, due to its pathogenic classification.
variants.additional_notes: This variant was not recurrent in the study population.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data was extracted from the main text and tables.
